scripts.dev: concurrently --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cargo +stable run --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:release: concurrently --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cargo +stable run --release --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: cargo +stable build --workspace && npm run build --prefix frontend
